channel.title: Adding the trade option to npcs?
channel.description: hi im making a new shop but the prob i've been getting is that i want thessialia to have the shop. but the trade option taks me to her 1st shop rather then her 2nd shop... how do i make another trade option that lets me trade her second shop :confused:[br][size=1]Posted at: September 02, 2006, 10:49:27 AM[/size][hr]11 views and 0 replys! somebody please help me!!!!

item.title: Adding the trade option to npcs?
item.dc:creator: @future future
item.description:
@future wrote:

Yea…Lol how cool would it be though like 3 shops in 1 with 3 diff trade options hehe.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding the trade option to npcs?
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

only each npc can have 1 shop, you have to get a diffrent npc or delete her first shop, thats why theres loads and loads of gen shop keepers when you look at the npc list, cause theres so many of them,

Read full topic
